Texts.Eng: Great work. Next, I suggest you start getting to work crafting ^orange;Mutavisk Seeds^reset; and start a farm. You'll want the textiles they can create fairly soon.
The ^orange;Oonforta^reset; is a weird but useful fungus. It produces light when thrown, and will be invaluable to you. Create some in ^orange;Greenhouse^reset; and try them out!
